def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_xy_light_gray = is_light(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_y_smaller_x = is_smaller(y, x, ctx)
        check_y_dark = is_dark(y, ctx)
        check_y_right_x = is_right(y, x, ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_large
            and check_xy_light_gray
            and check_y_smaller_x
            and check_y_dark
            and check_y_right_x
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for w, x, y, z in get4idxs(idxs):
        check_wxyz_set = set([w,x,y,z]) == set(idxs)
        check_wxyz_dark = all([is_dark(dot, ctx) for dot in [w,x,y]])
        check_z_light = is_light(z, ctx)
        if (
            check_wxyz_set
            and check_wxyz_dark
            and check_z_light
        ):
            results.append([w,x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_xy_light_gray = is_light(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_y_smaller_x = is_smaller(y, x, ctx)
        check_y_dark = is_dark(y, ctx)
        check_y_right_x = is_right(y, x, ctx)
        check_xy_close = get_distance(x, y, ctx) < 0.5
        if (
            check_xy_large
            and check_xy_light_gray
            and check_y_smaller_x
            and check_y_dark
            and check_y_right_x
            and check_xy_close
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def select(state):
    # Select a dot.
    return state
state = select(state)
